q: The company announced a bold new direction yesterday by partnering with Microsoft on its mobile strategy to compete with Apple and Google. The problem is it will take years for investors to see results. This partnership won't bear fruit until 2013 and beyond, said Alkesh Shah, an analyst with Evercore Partners. We recall one of David Letterman 's jokes went like this: Cause: Millions of prairie dogs die of a mysterious disease. "Effect: McRibs for a limited time. Anyway, that came to mind when we first heard about the documentary Return of the Prairie Bandit, which airs Thursday, Feb. 10 as part of The Nature of Things with David Suzuki on CBC.

An online promotion for Saturday's event, billed as "providing an alcohol-free environment filled with positive role models and messages for teens aged 14-17," said Michael Vick 's inspiring message about overcoming life's challenges has reached teenagers all over the country. The NFL indefinitely suspended Michael Vick in August 2007 after he pleaded guilty to a federal charge of bankrolling a dogfighting operation in Virginia.
